pages.text: Daily Happenings Monday: Live Music & Prime Rib Special Live music 9-12 Tuesday: Taco Tuesday & $8 Palomas or Margaritas Wednesday: Burger Night & Bocce League Mash Burger, fries, and a High Life for just $12. Thursday: Trivia & Ramen Night Team trivia from 7-9 p.m. Friday: Whiskey Flight Night & Ramen Special Happy Hour Monday-Saturday 4-6PM
